page.title: 20ENTERTAINMENT IN WINCANTON 2
page.content: "Beside the river Cale we have a {recreation ground,}an adventure playground and a field for cricket and games. Some children play on the Primary School field.Wincanton has its own{football team}and its own ground. My Dad used to be manager of the first team, but is now secretary." "My Mum is secretary of the{swimming club. Unfortunately Wincanton has not got an indoor heated pool so the club hires Sherborne School's pool. In the Summer we use the training pool outside Cale House or King Arthurs School pool. The deep end of this has just been filled in so it's too shallow to dive or jump in." {"Wincanton Silver band's}practice room is beside the old railway. We rehearse on Saturdays and Wednesdays." "I am a{bellringer.}The Parish church tower needs Â£30 000 for restoration."
